## MoneypStoreBaseState.totalRedistributed property

Total collateral and debt per stake that has been liquidated through redistribution.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
totalRedistributed: Vault;
```

## Remarks

Needed when dealing with instances of [VaultWithPendingRedistribution](./lib-base.vaultwithpendingredistribution.md)<!-- -->.
